title: Help needed for little puppy
selftext:
We feed and take care of street dogs of our area. One little puppy Zen was run over by some reckless csr driver and as a result she's suffered a fracture and her femur bone has been dislocated. The vet has suggested a corrective surgery. The surgery is going to cost 40,000 and has to be performed immediately. Please help us raise funds for Zen's surgery. I'm happy to ans any questions on the surgery or if u need any further details.

Pls contribute whatever amount you can, any help is much appreciated. 
Also pls share it with maximum people you can
Together we can save a puppy from being crippled.

Upi id - abhijeet.gupta.0002@okaxis
